about_the_game:
Project Three - Third time's the charm is a folder with videos from the development of project three, from all two previous versions and also the predecessor of project three, the entire development of the game goes back to 2021 and everything that was filmed or saved is in this folder, it also serves as developer support.

There were more people working on the game before, once even 10 at a time, finally the latest build is done by only one person.

the folder contains:

  • Behind the scenes.

  • Different versions of different maps or cutscenes (videos)

  • Gameplay from old builds

  • Recorded videos directly from the editor during development or retrospectively afterwards

  • A sample of various animations

  • Sample from test rooms, for physics test, etc..

How to get in folder:

Right click on the game, Manage --> Browse Local Files, and click on the folder named "Behind the scenes DLC (+ bonus)"

Thx for your support. Also, don't hesitate to add a review of which version you liked the most.

Project Three - Third time's the charm is a folder with videos from the development of project three, from all two previous versions and also the predecessor of project three, the entire development of the game goes back to 2021 and everything that was filmed or saved is in this folder, it also serves as developer support.

There were more people working on the game before, once even 10 at a time, finally the latest build is done by only one person.

the folder contains:

  • Behind the scenes.

  • Different versions of different maps or cutscenes (videos)

  • Gameplay from old builds

  • Recorded videos directly from the editor during development or retrospectively afterwards

  • A sample of various animations

  • Sample from test rooms, for physics test, etc..

How to get in folder:

Right click on the game, Manage --> Browse Local Files, and click on the folder named "Behind the scenes DLC (+ bonus)"

Thx for your support. Also, don't hesitate to add a review of which version you liked the most.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 2000
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia gtx 550
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.recommended:
